### Invitation for Services for Boilers at St-Hyacinthe Research and Development Centre

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Public Posting Date:** October 17, 2022
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** November 15, 2022, at 02:00 pm (EST)

**Contact Information:**
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
Carol Rahal, Contracting Officer
Email: [carol.rahal@agr.gc.ca](mailto:carol.rahal@agr.gc.ca)
Phone: 418-928-1059

**Project Overview:**
The Canadian Government, specifically Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), is soliciting proposals for services related to the maintenance and operation of boilers at the St-Hyacinthe Research and Development Centre.

**Scope of Work:**
AAFC requires a contractor to provide labor for periodic inspections and occasional one-time replacement of AAFC’s Stationary Engineer.

**Site Visit:**
A site visit is scheduled for November 2, 2022, at 10:00 am (EDT). Bidders are invited to confirm their attendance and provide the names of representatives by October 31, 2022, to AlexandreJean.Mongeau@AGR.GC.CA.

**Tender Requirements:**
To be eligible to submit a proposal, bidders must:

* Obtain the related specifications, plans, and drawings, and all other tender documents through the Buy and Sell service provider’s platform.
* Complete the RFP documents in accordance with the terms and conditions stated in the tender notice.

**Tenders Details:**
Tenders must be submitted electronically through the Buy and Sell platform by the closing date and time.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Evaluation of proposals will be based on the criteria outlined in the RFP documents.

**Amendments:**
Addenda, when issued, will be available from the Buy and Sell service provider platform.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

### Important Dates:

* *Site Visit: November 2, 2022, at 10:00 am (EDT)
* *Tender Closing Date and Time: November 15, 202
